description.zh-cn: 中国越剧演员，一级演员，擅演旦角。其表演师承金采风。
description.en: A Chinese Yue opera actress and a National First-class Actress, specializing in the Dan (female) role. She was mentored by Jin Caifeng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国浙江省下辖的地级市，谢群英的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Xie Qunying.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，全称为中华人民共和国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, officially known as the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国五大戏曲剧种之一，发源于浙江绍兴，是谢群英从事的专业领域。
description.en: One of the five major traditional Chinese opera genres, originating from Shaoxing, Zhejiang. It is the professional field of Xie Qunying.

description.zh-cn: 越剧表演艺术家，谢群英的老师。
description.en: A Yue opera performing artist and the mentor of Xie Qunying.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江桐庐的越剧表演团体，谢群英于1976年加入。
description.en: A Yue opera performance group based in Tonglu, Zhejiang, which Xie Qunying joined in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 位于浙江杭州的越剧表演团体，谢群英于1994年加入。
description.en: A Yue opera performance group based in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, which Xie Qunying joined in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 中国戏剧表演艺术的最高奖项。
description.en: The highest award for theatrical performance art in China.

description.zh-cn: 旨在表彰对中日戏剧交流有贡献的戏剧工作者的奖项。
description.en: An award to commend theater professionals who have contributed to Sino-Japanese theater exchanges.

description.zh-cn: 谢群英出生于浙江绍兴。
description.en: Xie Qunying was born in Shaoxing, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 谢群英的越剧表演师承金采风。
description.en: Xie Qunying's Yue opera performance was mentored by Jin Caifeng.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，谢群英进入桐庐越剧团工作。
description.en: In 1976, Xie Qunying joined the Tonglu Yue Opera Troupe.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，谢群英进入杭州越剧院工作。
description.en: In 1994, Xie Qunying joined the Hangzhou Yue Opera Theatre.

description.zh-cn: 1998年，谢群英获得第十五届中国戏剧梅花奖，这是对她艺术成就的高度认可。
description.en: In 1998, Xie Qunying won the 15th China Theatre Plum Blossom Award, a high recognition of her artistic achievements.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，谢群英获得第三届中日戏剧友谊奖。
description.en: In 2005, Xie Qunying won the 3rd Sino-Japan Theatre Friendship Award.
